ground_truth: Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline, where Indy reaches for his gun, tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass. Henry hands his case to Indy, then suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing, and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine. The engine sputters, causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the skies and explode off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him, and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach. Meanwhile, the Sultan is seated in his royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and surrounded by his minions. Donovan holds the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan walk together through an archway. The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk, only to go past it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood, and it is revealed to be Kazim, the spy at the court. Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat, while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder. Henry removes his hat and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, move along through the box canyon, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress, carrying both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan notices a reflection from the hills, and at that moment, the tank fires a shell in their direction. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to cover their heads as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock, pointing his rifle at the group below, as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank, with bullets exploding around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry sprint down the mountainside to the shoreline, where Indy reaches for his firearm, tucked in his trousers. He opens the firearm's chamber and spins around as a Messerschmidt arrives for another pass. Henry hands his valise to Indy, then abruptly pivots around, screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his parasol. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing, and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the motor. The motor sputters, causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the heavens and explode off screen. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him, and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry stroll down the beach. Meanwhile, the Sultan is seated in his royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and surrounded by his subordinates. Donovan holds the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan walk together through an archway. The Sultan rises from his chair and walks toward the trunk, only to go past it and examine the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood, and it is revealed to be Kazim, the spy at the court. Elsa descends the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his vehicle through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the rear seat, while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder. Henry removes his hat and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's group, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, move along through the box canyon, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, and the Turkish soldiers wear native attire, carrying both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's group in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan notices a reflection from the hills, and at that moment, the tank fires a shell in their direction. Kazim peers over a rock, pointing his rifle at the group below, as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank, with bullets exploding around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry are run down the mountainside to the shoreline by themselves, where a gun, tucked in Indy's pants, is reached for by him. The gun's chamber is opened by him, and he swings around as another pass is being made by a Messerschmidt. A case is handed by Henry to Indy, then he suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls are taken to the wing, and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that the cockpit is splattered with and the engine is clogged. The engine is sputtered by the faulty mechanism, causing the Messerschmidt to be caused to fall from the skies, and it explodes off camera. Indy is stood stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him, and a proud expression is worn by Indy as he watches Henry be walked down the beach by himself. Meanwhile, his royal chair is seated in by the Sultan, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and his minions surround him. The missing Grail Diary pages are held by Donovan as he and the Sultan are walked through an archway. The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk, only to pass it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby. The engine under the hood is pointed to by him, and Kazim, the spy at the court, is revealed. Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah is driving his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat, while his arms are waved by Sallah and a camel herder is shouted to by him. Henry's hat is removed by him and Indy is hit with it by him. Elsa and Donovan's party, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, is moved along through the box canyon by them, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, and native dress is worn by the Turkish soldiers, who carry both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car being driven by Donovan. Henry and Sallah are placed at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then a reflection from the hills is noticed by Donovan, and at that moment, a shell is fired in their direction by the tank. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car, and Indy, Henry, and Sallah are caused to cover their heads as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock, points his rifle at the group below, and bullets are exploded off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank, and bullets are exploded around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue firing.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry rush down the mountainside to the shore, where Indy retrieves his gun. As a Messerschmidt approaches, Henry distracts a flock of seagulls with his umbrella, causing them to fly into the propeller, clogging the engine, and making the plane crash off camera. Indy stands shocked as Henry returns, visibly impressed. Meanwhile, the Sultan, seated with Donovan and Vogel, sees Donovan with the Grail Diary pages. As the Sultan inspects a Nazi staff car, Kazim, the court spy, is revealed. Elsa approaches Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives through crowded streets with Indy and Henry, shouting to a camel herder. Henry hits Indy with his hat. Elsa and Donovan's convoy, including a vintage World War I tank and Turkish soldiers, moves through a canyon. Brody sits with Elsa. Indy sees the convoy from a distance. Donovan notices a glint from the hills, then a tank shell destroys a nearby car, forcing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to duck. Kazim targets them as bullets rain and explosions occur. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls, with Kazim's men, the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continuing their attack.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry race down the mountainside to the shore. Indy grabs his gun and prepares as a Messerschmidt approaches. Henry distracts a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella, causing them to clog the Messerschmidt's engine, crashing it. Indy, amazed, watches Henry walk away proudly. Meanwhile, the Sultan and Donovan examine a Nazi staff car, revealing spy Kazim. Elsa joins Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives with Indy and Henry through busy streets, signaling a camel herder. Henry hits Indy with his hat. Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel travel with a convoy, including a vintage WWI tank and Turkish soldiers. Brody joins them. Indy, Henry, and Sallah spot the convoy. Then, a tank shell from the convoy blows up a nearby car, forcing them to take cover. Kazim, aiming his rifle, watches as bullets explode. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank, while Kazim’s men—Brethren of the Cruciform Sword—keep firing.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry rapidly make their way down the steep mountainside until they reach the shoreline below. As soon as they stop, Indy instinctively reaches for his gun, which is securely tucked away in his pants. With careful precision, he opens the chamber of the firearm and, with a quick motion, swings around just as a fearsome Messerschmidt flies in for another deadly pass. In the heat of the moment, Henry hands his case over to Indy, only to suddenly whirl around, screaming and shouting at a massive flock of sea gulls, using his umbrella to create a chaotic disturbance. The birds, startled, take to the sky all at once, creating a cascade of wings beating against the air. The Messerschmidt's fierce, whirling propeller blades slice through them, turning the birds into a feathery white puree that splatters all over the cockpit and clogs the engine, causing it to sputter uncontrollably. The malfunctioning engine leads to the Messerschmidt plummeting from the sky and exploding off camera. Indy is left standing in shock, frozen like a statue, as Henry calmly walks back to him. Indy’s face fills with pride as he watches Henry walk down the length of the beach. Elsewhere, the Sultan is comfortably seated in his royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, with his loyal minions surrounding him. Donovan, holding the much-coveted missing Grail Diary pages, accompanies the Sultan as they walk together through a grand archway. The Sultan then rises from his chair and makes his way toward a trunk, only to bypass it and closely inspect the nearby parked Nazi staff car. He gestures toward the engine beneath the open hood, revealing it to be Kazim, the spy lurking within the court's midst. Meanwhile, Elsa gracefully descends the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel, while Sallah, driving through the crowded streets, is accompanied by Indy and Henry seated beside him and in the back seat, respectively. Sallah energetically waves his arms, shouting to a camel herder as they pass. In the car, Henry removes his hat and playfully hits Indy with it. Nearby, Elsa and Donovan's convoy, consisting of a supply truck, a tank, and several other various vehicles, advances through the winding box canyon, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The vintage World War I tank, with its massive treads, leads the procession, and the accompanying Turkish soldiers, dressed in native attire, are armed with both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. As Donovan and his entourage move along, Henry and Sallah remain at Indy's side, watching as Donovan's party becomes visible in the distance, with a car carrying all their essential supplies parked nearby. Suddenly, Donovan's attention is captured by a reflection from the hills. At that very moment, the tank unleashes a shell in their direction. The shell whistles ominously overhead before its explosion obliterates the parked supply car, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to instinctively cover their heads as debris rains down upon them. Meanwhile, Kazim peers cautiously over a rock, his rifle trained on the group below, as bullets erupt against the vehicles and cliffs. Donovan and Elsa duck for cover just as a Nazi soldier is thrown from the tank, with bullets continuing to explode chaotically around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, relentlessly maintain their fire.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry urgently and rapidly make their way down the steep and rocky mountainside, deftly navigating the treacherous terrain until they finally reach the welcoming shoreline below. As soon as they come to a halt, Indy, operating on pure instinct, swiftly reaches for his trusty gun, which is securely tucked away in his pants. With meticulous care and precision, he opens the chamber of the firearm and, with a quick and decisive motion, swings around just as the fearsome Messerschmidt, with its menacing appearance, flies in for another potentially deadly pass. In the intensity of the moment, Henry instinctively hands his case over to Indy, only to suddenly whirl around, screaming frantically and shouting at the top of his lungs at a massive flock of sea gulls. He uses his umbrella to create a chaotic and frenzied disturbance. The birds, startled and confused, take to the sky all at once, creating a cascading frenzy of wings beating frantically against the air. The Messerschmidt's fierce and unforgiving whirling propeller blades slice through them, turning the birds into a feathery white puree that splatters and covers the cockpit and clogs the engine, causing it to sputter uncontrollably. The malfunctioning and failing engine leads to the Messerschmidt plummeting uncontrollably from the sky and eventually exploding off-camera. Indy is left standing in shock and disbelief, frozen like a statue, as Henry calmly walks back to him. Indy’s face fills with admiration and pride as he watches Henry confidently walk down the length of the sandy beach. Meanwhile, elsewhere, the Sultan is comfortably seated in his magnificent and regal royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, with his loyal minions strategically surrounding him. Donovan, holding the much-coveted and valuable missing Grail Diary pages, accompanies the Sultan as they walk together through a grand and impressive archway. The Sultan then rises majestically from his chair and makes his way toward a sturdy trunk, only to bypass it and closely inspect the nearby parked Nazi staff car. He gestures toward the engine beneath the open hood, revealing it to be Kazim, the cunning spy lurking within the court's midst. Meanwhile, Elsa gracefully descends the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel, while Sallah, energetically driving through the crowded streets, is accompanied by Indy and Henry seated beside him and in the back seat, respectively. Sallah energetically waves his arms, shouting to a passing camel herder as they drive by. Inside the car, Henry removes his hat and playfully taps Indy with it. Nearby, Elsa and Donovan's convoy, consisting of a supply truck, a formidable tank, and several other various vehicles, advances through the winding box canyon, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The vintage and imposing World War I tank, with its massive and threatening treads, leads the important procession, and the accompanying Turkish soldiers, dressed in native attire, are armed with both carbines and gleaming sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. As Donovan and his entourage move along, Henry and Sallah remain securely at Indy's side, watching as Donovan's entourage gradually becomes visible in the distance, with a car carrying all their essential and vital supplies parked nearby. Suddenly, Donovan's attention is abruptly captured by a shimmering reflection from the hills. At that very moment, the tank unleashes a powerful shell in their direction. The shell whistles ominously and menacingly overhead before its explosion obliterates the parked supply car, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to instinctively cover their heads as debris rains down upon them. Meanwhile, Kazim peers cautiously and intently over a rock, his rifle trained on the group below, as bullets erupt ferociously against the vehicles and cliffs. Donovan and Elsa duck for cover just as a Nazi soldier is thrown violently from the tank, with bullets continuing to explode chaotically around him, while Kazim's men, members of the determined Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, relentlessly maintain their unyielding fire.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry sprint down the mountainside, with gravity aiding their descent as they skillfully navigate the uneven terrain until they reach the shoreline, the ground flattening beneath their feet. Indy instinctively reaches down, feeling the familiar weight of the gun tucked securely in his pants, and swiftly retrieves it. He quickly opens the gun's chamber, ensuring it’s ready for use, and then whirls around with precision, just as the Messerschmidt plane approaches for another menacing pass above. In a moment of urgency, Henry hands his case over to Indy, his hands moving swiftly before he spontaneously spins on his heel. With a determined expression, he rushes towards a nearby flock of sea gulls, using his umbrella to gesticulate wildly while emitting a series of loud screams and shouts that echo across the shoreline. The startled sea gulls launch into the air in a chaotic frenzy, creating a cloud of white wings as they take to the sky. The Messerschmidt’s propeller, spinning relentlessly, slices through the flock, sending a cascade of feathers and bird body parts swirling through the air, coating the cockpit and jamming the engine. The engine coughs and sputters, its sound faltering, until the plane, bereft of power, plummets from the heavens and meets its unseen fiery fate, exploding off camera. Indy stands frozen, his body tense with surprise, like a statue as his eyes remain fixed on Henry, who walks back towards him with calm assurance. Indy’s face shifts, reflecting a blend of admiration and pride as he observes Henry confidently stride along the beach. Meanwhile, in a stark contrast of environment, the Sultan sits regally in his ornate chair, surrounded by an entourage including Walter Donovan and Vogel, as well as a cohort of obedient minions. Donovan clutches the crucial Grail Diary pages, his eyes glinting with ambition, as he accompanies the Sultan through a grand archway, their footsteps echoing in the chamber. The Sultan leaves his seat, advancing purposefully toward a trunk, but bypasses it to scrutinize a nearby parked Nazi staff car, directing attention to its engine. In a cunning revelation, the engine compartment unveils Kazim, the spy cleverly concealed and embedded within the court's inner circle. At the same instance, Elsa, with an air of determination, descends the staircase towards Donovan and Vogel, her movements fluid and calculated. Concurrently, Sallah expertly maneuvers his car through the bustling streets, with Indy occupying the passenger seat and Henry situated in the back. Sallah's voice rises above the street's din as he gestures animatedly, shouting at a camel herder to clear the congested path. Henry, maintaining some semblance of order, removes his hat with a deliberate motion and playfully swats Indy, the soft fabric landing harmlessly against him. Nearby, Elsa and Donovan's expedition, a formidable convoy comprising a supply truck, a tank, and an assortment of vehicles, advances steadily through the box canyon. Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel travel in an open car, the wind catching their hair as they move. The tank, an imposing relic of World War I, rumbles forward on its enormous treads, while the Turkish soldiers, arrayed in native dress, brandish both carbines and sabers, prepared for whatever may come. Brody occupies a seat beside Elsa in the back of the car driven by Donovan, his presence unnoticed in the convoy's larger scheme. Observing from a distance, Henry and Sallah stand beside Indy, who scans the horizon, locking his gaze on Donovan's party as it progresses, with their car full of vital supplies parked conspicuously nearby. Donovan, keenly observant, picks up on the flicker of reflection coming from the hills beyond, his mind registering potential threat. In response, the tank's cannon fires a shell with a deafening roar, the projectile soaring through the air before obliterating the parked car, reducing it to smoking debris. Shockwaves ripple outward, forcing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to instinctively duck and shield their heads, as fragments of the shattered automobile rain down around them like metallic confetti. Not far off, Kazim stealthily peers over the edge of a rock, his rifle firmly in hand, taking aim at the group below. Bullets strike with explosive force against the vehicles and cliffside, the skirmish intensifying with every shot. Donovan and Elsa instinctively duck in the car, seeking refuge from the hail of gunfire, as a Nazi soldier is violently ejected from the tank, a cascade of bullets hitting all around him. Amidst this turmoil, Kazim's compatriots, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, persist in their relentless defense, continuing to fire with unwavering determination.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry race down the mountainside to the shoreline, where Indy retrieves his gun and prepares for action as a Messerschmidt makes another pass. Henry distracts the aircraft by waving his umbrella at a flock of sea gulls, causing them to take flight and crash into the plane's propeller, ultimately leading to its demise. Indy stands in awe as Henry returns with a proud look. Meanwhile, the Sultan, accompanied by Walter Donovan and Vogel, moves through an archway with the missing Grail Diary pages. The Sultan examines a Nazi staff car and reveals Kazim as the spy. In the city, Sallah drives Indy and Henry through crowded streets, gesturing to a camel herder, while Henry playfully hits Indy with his hat. Elsewhere, Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel travel through a box canyon with a convoy, including a vintage World War I tank manned by Turkish soldiers. Indy, Henry, and Sallah, observing from a distance, notice Donovan's group when the tank fires, destroying their parked car. They take cover from the debris as Kazim and his men engage in a firefight with Donovan's forces, resulting in chaos and gunfire.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry, pursued by danger, run down the mountainside near the Swiss Alps to the Adriatic Sea's rocky shoreline, where Indy reaches for his Luger pistol, tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber, a common practice for ensuring it's loaded, and swings around as a Messerschmitt, a German World War II fighter plane, comes in for another pass. Henry, quick-thinking and resourceful, hands his waterproof case to Indy, then suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a nearby flock of sea gulls with his umbrella, a typical accessory in his scholarly attire. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing, and the Messerschmitt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine, a tactic reminiscent of the historical bird strikes faced by pilots. The engine sputters, causing the Messerschmitt to fall from the skies, crashing into the sea and explode off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him, and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach, the scene reminiscent of their shared adventures. Meanwhile, the Sultan, ruler of a Middle Eastern kingdom, is seated in his ornate royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, high-ranking Nazi officers, and surrounded by his minions. Donovan, a wealthy industrialist with hidden motives, holds the missing Grail Diary pages, essential to finding the Holy Grail, as he and the Sultan walk together through an intricately carved archway. The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk, only to go past it and inspect the staff car—a symbol of Nazi influence—parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood, and it is revealed to be Kazim, a member of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword and a spy at the court. Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel, her demeanor seductive yet calculating, as Sallah, Indy's loyal Egyptian friend, drives his car through the crowded streets of Istanbul with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat, while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder who obstructs their path. Henry removes his hat, a gesture of frustration, and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party, ominous in intent, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, move along through the box canyon, a strategic location, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, a relic repurposed for their expedition, and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress, carrying both carbines and sabers, blending modern weaponry with traditional attire. Brody, Indy's absent-minded but brave colleague, sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby, brimming with archaeological equipment and essentials. Then Donovan, ever vigilant, notices a reflection from the hills, and at that moment, the tank fires a shell in their direction. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to cover their heads as automobile fragments rain down upon them, a scene of chaos and destruction. Kazim peers over a rock, pointing his rifle at the group below, as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff, maintaining his duty to protect the Grail. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank, with bullets exploding around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire, determined to thwart the pursuit of the Grail.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline where Indy reaches for his gun tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass. Henry hands his case to Indy then suddenly spins around screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine. The engine sputters causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the skies and explode off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach. Meanwhile the Sultan is seated in his royal chair flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel and surrounded by his minions. Donovan holds the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan walk together through an archway. The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk only to go past it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood and it is revealed to be Kazim the spy at the court. Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Henry removes his hat and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party consisting of a supply truck tank and various other vehicles move along through the box canyon with Elsa Donovan and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress carrying both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan notices a reflection from the hills and at that moment the tank fires a she will in their direction. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car causing Indy Henry and Sallah to cover their heads. as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock pointing his rifle at the group below as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank with bullets exploding around him while Kazim's men. members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline where Indy reaches for his gun tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass. Henry hands his case to Indy then suddenly spins around screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine. The engine sputters causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the skies and explode off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach. Meanwhile the Sultan is seated in his royal chair flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel and surrounded by his minions. Donovan holds the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan walk together through an archway. The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk only to go past it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood and it is revealed to be Kazim the spy at the court. Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Henry removes his hat and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party consisting of a supply truck tank and various other vehicles move along through the box canyon with Elsa Donovan and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress carrying both carbines and sabers. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan notices a reflection from the hills and at that moment the tank fires a she will in their direction. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car causing Indy Henry and Sallah to cover their heads. as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock pointing his rifle at the group below as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank with bullets exploding around him while Kazim's men. members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword continue to fire.

test_cases.description: Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline where Indy reaches for his gun tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass. Henry hands his case to Indy then suddenly spins around screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine. The engine sputters causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the skies and explode off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car causing Indy Henry and Sallah to cover their heads. as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock pointing his rifle at the group below as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank with bullets exploding around him while Kazim's men. members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline where Indy reaches for his gun tucked in his pants. He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass. Henry hands his case to Indy then suddenly spins around screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank with bullets exploding around him while Kazim's men. members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Bella and Joshua run down the mountainside to the shoreline, where Bella reaches for her gun, tucked in her pants. She opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a pelican comes in for another pass. Joshua hands his case to Bella, then suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing, and the pelican's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine. The engine sputters, causing the pelican to fall from the skies and explode off camera. Bella stands stunned like a statue as Joshua walks back to her, and Bella wears a proud expression as she watches Joshua walk down the beach. Meanwhile, the Emperor is seated in his royal chair, flanked by Gabrielle and Blake, and surrounded by his minions. Gabrielle holds the missing Grail Diary pages as she and the Emperor walk together through an archway. The Emperor gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk, only to go past it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He points to the engine under the hood, and it is revealed to be Mia, the spy at the court. Clara comes down the stairs toward Gabrielle and Blake as Tyson drives his car through the crowded streets with Bella beside him and Joshua in the back seat, while Tyson waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder. Joshua removes his hat and hits Bella with it. Clara and Gabrielle's party, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, move along through the box canyon, with Clara, Gabrielle, and Blake traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress, carrying both carbines and sabers. Riley sits alongside Clara in the rear of the car carrying Gabrielle. Joshua and Tyson are at Bella's side as she views Gabrielle's party in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Gabrielle notices a reflection from the hills, and at that moment, the tank fires a shell in their direction. It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car, causing Bella, Joshua, and Tyson to cover their heads as automobile fragments rain down upon them. Mia peers over a rock, pointing her rifle at the group below, as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff. Gabrielle and Clara duck as a pirate falls from the tank, with bullets exploding around him, while Mia's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry run down the hillside to the riverbank, where Indy reaches for his slingshot, tucked in his jacket. He opens the slingshot's pouch and swings around as a glider comes in for another pass. Henry hands his satchel to Indy, then suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a flock of pigeons with his walking stick. Thousands of pigeons take to the air, and the glider's whirling wings slice through them into a feathery white mash that splatters against the nose and clogs the rudder. The rudder stalls, causing the glider to plummet from the sky and burst into flames off camera. Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him, and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the promenade. Meanwhile, the Duke is seated in his royal chaise, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and surrounded by his attendants. Donovan holds the missing Grail Map pages as he and the Duke walk together through a colonnade. The Duke gets up from his chaise and walks toward the barrel, only to go past it and inspect the military jeep parked nearby. He points to the transmission under the bonnet, and it is revealed to be Kazim, the spy at the gathering. Elsa comes down the steps toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his cart through the bustling streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat, while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a donkey driver. Henry removes his cap and hits Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party, consisting of a freight wagon, armored car, and various other vehicles, move along through the narrow gorge, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open buggy. The armored car is a vintage World War I model with enormous wheels, and the Turkish guards wear native attire, carrying both crossbows and spears. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the buggy carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance, with a buggy containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan notices a flash from the hills, and at that moment, the armored car fires a projectile in their direction. It whistles overhead and detonates the parked buggy, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to cover their heads as wagon parts rain down upon them. Kazim peers over a boulder, pointing his crossbow at the group below, as arrows explode off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the armored car, with arrows exploding around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry dance down the mountainside to the shoreline, where Indy grasps for his gun, tucked in his pants. He closes the gun's chamber and hops around as a Messerschmidt floats in for another pass. Henry tosses his case to Indy, then suddenly twirls around, humming and gesturing into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella. Thousands of sea gulls dive into the water, and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades churn them into a feathery white cloud that drifts against the cockpit and jams the engine. The engine hums, causing the Messerschmidt to glide from the skies and dissolve off camera. Indy crouches stunned like a statue as Henry skips back to him, and Indy wears a surprised expression as he observes Henry dance down the beach. Meanwhile, the Sultan is reclining in his royal chair, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and surrounded by his minions. Donovan waves the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan skip together through an archway. The Sultan leaps up from his chair and skips toward the trunk, only to move past it and gaze at the Nazi staff car parked nearby. He gestures to the engine under the hood, and it is revealed to be Kazim, the spy at the court. Elsa descends the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah cruises his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat, while Sallah juggles his arms and sings to a camel herder. Henry lifts his hat and taps Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's party, consisting of a supply truck, tank, and various other vehicles, coast along through the box canyon, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel traveling in an open car. The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads, and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress, carrying both carbines and sabers. Brody lounges alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he observes Donovan's party in the distance, with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby. Then Donovan spots a reflection from the hills, and at that moment, the tank releases a shell in their direction. It glides overhead and illuminates the parked car, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to cover their heads as automobile fragments drift down upon them. Kazim peers over a rock, directing his rifle at the group below, as bullets pop off the vehicles and cliff. Donovan and Elsa leap down as a Nazi soldier floats from the tank, with bullets bursting around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword, continue to fire.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Tina and Max glide down the hillside to the riverbank, where Tina reaches for her banana, tucked in her jacket. She opens the banana's peel and swings around as a kite swoops in for another pass. Max hands his notebook to Tina, then suddenly spins around, screaming and shouting into a flock of flamingos with his backpack. Thousands of flamingos take to the air, and the kite's whirling string tangles them into a feathery pink mess that splatters against the sail and clogs the tail. The tail sputters, causing the kite to dive from the clouds and vanish off stage. Tina stands stunned like a mannequin as Max walks back to her, and Tina wears a delighted expression as she watches Max walk down the meadow. Meanwhile, the Emperor is seated in his ornate bed, flanked by Charles Doolittle and Fenton, and surrounded by his acolytes. Doolittle holds the missing Treasure Map pages as he and the Emperor stroll together through a doorway. The Emperor rises from his bed and walks toward the suitcase, only to bypass it and inspect the pirate ship docked nearby. He points to the anchor under the bow, and it is revealed to be Mira, the informant at the palace. Clara descends the stairs toward Doolittle and Fenton as Rafi drives his truck through the bustling market with Tina beside him and Max in the passenger seat, while Rafi waves his hands and shouts to a goat farmer. Max removes his scarf and hits Tina with it. Clara and Doolittle's entourage, consisting of a cargo plane, schooner, and various other vessels, move along through the canyon pass, with Clara, Doolittle, and Fenton traveling in an open jeep. The schooner is a vintage 1920s model with massive sails, and the islanders wear traditional attire, carrying both bows and spears. Quincy sits alongside Clara in the back of the jeep carrying Doolittle. Max and Rafi are at Tina's side as she views Doolittle's entourage in the distance, with a chariot containing all their things parked nearby. Then Doolittle notices a glint from the mountain, and at that moment, the schooner launches a flare in their direction. It whistles overhead and smashes the parked chariot, causing Tina, Max, and Rafi to cover their heads as debris showers down upon them. Mira peers over a boulder, pointing her slingshot at the group below, as stones crack off the vessels and ridge. Doolittle and Clara duck as a henchman tumbles from the schooner, with stones cracking around him, while Mira's allies, members of the Order of the Golden Lance, continue to hurl projectiles.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Arlo and Max glide down the hillslope to the boardwalk, where Arlo fetches his flask, nestled in his belt. He examines the flask's cap and pirouettes as a biplane hovers in for another sweep. Max tosses his notebook to Arlo, then abruptly twirls around, laughing and hollering into a cluster of pelicans with his cane. Thousands of pelicans rise into the air, and the biplane's spinning propeller blades churn them into a feathery white froth that smatters against the cockpit and jams the engine. The engine coughs, causing the biplane to spiral earthward and combust off screen. Arlo stands rooted like a tree as Max strolls back to him, and Arlo displays a satisfied grin as he watches Max march up the pier. Meanwhile, the Duke is perched in his ornate throne, flanked by Carlos Santos and Ludwig, and encircled by his entourage. Santos clutches the stolen Map of Atlantis as he and the Duke saunter together through a gateway. The Duke rises from his throne and strides toward the chest, only to bypass it and appraise the Italian sports car parked adjacent. He gestures to the engine beneath the hood, and it is unveiled to be Amir, the informant at the palace. Clara descends the staircase toward Santos and Ludwig as Omar pilots his vehicle through the bustling alleys with Arlo beside him and Max in the rear seat, while Omar flails his arms and bellows to a fruit vendor. Max lifts his scarf and taps Arlo with it. Clara and Santos's convoy, consisting of a supply van, armored vehicle, and several other transports, proceed along through the narrow gorge, with Clara, Santos, and Ludwig traveling in an open jeep. The armored vehicle is a classic World War I model with massive tracks, and the Ottoman guards wear traditional attire, wielding both muskets and scimitars. Brody reclines beside Clara in the back of the jeep carrying Santos. Max and Omar are at Arlo's flank as he observes Santos's convoy in the horizon, with a vehicle holding all their provisions parked close by. Then Santos spots a glint from the ridges, and at that instant, the armored vehicle fires a shot in their direction. It whistles past and obliterates the parked vehicle, prompting Arlo, Max, and Omar to shield their faces as debris showers down upon them. Amir peers from behind a boulder, aiming his crossbow at the troop below, as projectiles burst off the transports and cliff. Santos and Clara cower as a German trooper tumbles from the armored vehicle, with gunfire erupting around him, while Amir's allies, members of the Order of the Silver Dagger, persist in discharging their weapons.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry glide down the glacier to the riverbank, where Indy reaches for his flashlight, tucked in his jacket. He twists the flashlight's bulb and dances around as a Zepplin floats in for another turn. Henry hands his basket to Indy, then suddenly leaps around, laughing and singing into a swarm of butterflies with his kite. Thousands of butterflies flutter to the air, and the Zepplin's spinning rotor blades scatter them into a colorful confetti that dusts against the cockpit and blocks the engine. The engine wheezes, causing the Zepplin to drift from the skies and disappear off screen. Indy stands surprised like a pillar as Henry strolls back to him, and Indy wears a joyful expression as he watches Henry stroll down the shore. Meanwhile, the Sultan is seated in his royal throne, flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel, and encircled by his guards. Donovan clutches the missing Grail Map pages as he and the Sultan amble together through a gateway. The Sultan rises from his throne and ambles toward the suitcase, only to bypass it and inspect the Nazi bicycle parked nearby. He points to the chain beneath the frame, and it is revealed to be Kazim, the spy at the court. Elsa descends the ladder toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah pedals his scooter through the bustling streets with Indy beside him and Henry on the rear peg, while Sallah flails his arms and jokes to a goat herder. Henry removes his scarf and taps Indy with it. Elsa and Donovan's procession, consisting of a food truck, blimp, and various other contraptions, navigate along through the narrow gorge, with Elsa, Donovan, and Vogel riding in a convertible boat. The blimp is an antique World War I model with massive wheels, and the Turkish soldiers wear traditional attire, wielding both muskets and lances. Brody sits alongside Elsa in the back of the boat carrying Donovan. Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he observes Donovan's procession in the distance, with a boat containing all their gear docked nearby. Then Donovan notices a flash from the cliffs, and at that moment, the blimp launches a flare in their direction. It hisses overhead and incinerates the parked boat, causing Indy, Henry, and Sallah to shield their faces as ship splinters cascade down upon them. Kazim peers over a boulder, training his water pistol at the group below, as balloons pop off the contraptions and cliff. Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi swimmer tumbles from the blimp, with balloons detonating around him, while Kazim's men, members of the Brethren of the Circular Blade, continue to splash.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Barnaby and Rufus slide up the hillside to the treetop, where Barnaby reaches for his whistle, hidden in his apron. He unlocks the whistle's clasp and tumbles around as a biplane floats in for another swoop. Rufus tosses his book to Barnaby, then suddenly flips around, laughing and singing into a swarm of fireflies with his lantern. Millions of fireflies take to the breeze, and the biplane's spinning wing tips slice them into a glittering gold dust that sparkles against the windshield and jams the controls. The controls waver, causing the biplane to glide from the clouds and vanish off screen. Barnaby stands amazed like a figurine as Rufus strolls back to him, and Barnaby wears a cheerful demeanor as he watches Rufus wander up the path. Meanwhile, the Duke is perched in his plush chair, flanked by Chester Hamilton and Leopold, and encircled by his entourage. Hamilton clutches the lost Map Codex sheets as he and the Duke stroll together through a gateway. The Duke rises from his chair and strides toward the crate, only to bypass it and examine the vintage horse cart stationed nearby. He gestures to the wheel under the carriage, and it is unveiled to be Marcel, the informant at the palace. Inga descends the ladder toward Hamilton and Leopold as Ahmed paddles his rickshaw through the busy lanes with Barnaby beside him and Rufus in the back seat, while Ahmed swings his legs and sings to a fruit vendor. Rufus removes his scarf and taps Barnaby with it. Inga and Hamilton's crew, consisting of a cargo ship, chariot, and various other transports, roll along through the narrow canyon, with Inga, Hamilton, and Leopold traveling in an open wagon. The chariot is a retro Roman model with massive wheels, and the Mongolian guards wear tribal attire, wielding both bows and spears. Conway sits beside Inga in the rear of the wagon carrying Hamilton. Rufus and Ahmed are at Barnaby's elbow as he surveys Hamilton's crew in the vista, with a wagon holding all their provisions parked nearby. Then Hamilton spots a shimmer from the peaks, and at that moment, the chariot launches a javelin in their direction. It shrieks overhead and demolishes the parked wagon, causing Barnaby, Rufus, and Ahmed to shield their faces as rickshaw debris rains down upon them. Marcel peers over a boulder, aiming his slingshot at the crowd below, as marbles skitter off the transports and cliff. Hamilton and Inga crouch as a German officer tumbles from the chariot, with marbles skittering around him, while Marcel's crew, members of the Brotherhood of the Diamond Sword, persist in firing.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Indy and Henry rush down a mountainside to the shoreline, where Indy draws his gun as a Messerschmidt approaches. Henry startles a flock of seagulls with his umbrella, causing them to fly into the plane's path, clogging its engine and leading it to crash. Indy looks on in amazement, feeling proud of Henry. Meanwhile, Donovan and Vogel accompany the Sultan, holding the missing Grail Diary pages. The Sultan examines a Nazi staff car, revealing Kazim, a spy. Nearby, Elsa and Donovan's convoy, including a tank and various vehicles, travels through a canyon. Indy, Henry, and Sallah observe from a distance as Donovan's group comes into view. A tank shell nearly hits them, blowing up a parked car and showering fragments. As gunfire erupts, Kazim targets the group, with the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword attacking Donovan's forces.

test_cases.name: Rotate Half Paragraph
test_cases.description: Henry removes his hat and hits Indy with it Elsa and Donovan's party consisting of a supply truck tank and various other vehicles move along through the box canyon with Elsa Donovan and Vogel traveling in an open car The tank is a vintage World War I model with enormous treads and the Turkish soldiers wear native dress carrying both carbines and sabers Brody sits alongside Elsa in the rear of the car carrying Donovan Henry and Sallah are at Indy's side as he views Donovan's party in the distance with a car containing all their supplies parked nearby Then Donovan notices a reflection from the hills and at that moment the tank fires a she will in their direction It whistles overhead and blows up the parked car causing Indy Henry and Sallah to cover their heads as automobile fragments rain down upon them Kazim peers over a rock pointing his rifle at the group below as bullets explode off the vehicles and cliff Donovan and Elsa duck as a Nazi soldier falls from the tank with bullets exploding around him while Kazim's men members of the Brethren of the Cruciform Sword continue to fire Indy and Henry run down the mountainside to the shoreline where Indy reaches for his gun tucked in his pants He opens the gun's chamber and swings around as a Messerschmidt comes in for another pass Henry hands his case to Indy then suddenly spins around screaming and shouting into a flock of sea gulls with his umbrella Thousands of sea gulls take to the wing and the Messerschmidt's whirling propeller blades shred them into a feathery white puree that splatters against the cockpit and clogs the engine The engine sputters causing the Messerschmidt to fall from the skies and explode off camera Indy stands stunned like a statue as Henry walks back to him and Indy wears a proud expression as he watches Henry walk down the beach Meanwhile the Sultan is seated in his royal chair flanked by Walter Donovan and Vogel and surrounded by his minions Donovan holds the missing Grail Diary pages as he and the Sultan walk together through an archway The Sultan gets up from his chair and walks toward the trunk only to go past it and inspect the Nazi staff car parked nearby He points to the engine under the hood and it is revealed to be Kazim the spy at the court Elsa comes down the stairs toward Donovan and Vogel as Sallah drives his car through the crowded streets with Indy beside him and Henry in the back seat while Sallah waves his arms and shouts to a camel herder
